attributes.action: Consider and take some acion to stop illegal immigration and be more strict immigration in general about it...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By being stricter on immigration, it will cut down on overcrowding and worries on an extreme population growth, which allows diseases to spread, poorer health services, more poverty, more power cuts, more pollution and more crime. The list goes on, and as global warming and natural disasters worsen, our country needs to be joined, in harsh times we need adequate facilities to support our needs and overpopulation will only worsen the effect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
